page.title: 08THE PEOPLE OF MARKS TEY - 7
page.content: {OPINIONS & ATTITUDES {What people like about Marks Tey 32 said they liked Marks Tey because it was handy to get to other places by road and rail.Lots of people liked the fact it was near the country side and others thought the people were friendly.{What people didn't like.}The main concern was the dangerous roads. 55 people said they were concerned about the speed of the traffic,the number of accidents and that the footpaths were dangerous to walk upon.Other aspects & concern included dogs fouling the footpaths and play areas,vandalism,the position of the playing field away from the estate,the lack of shops especially in the estate,the A12 dividing the community,the lack of a community spirit and 5 people even criticised the Parish Council.{
